name: Brian: The Novice Barbarian
overview: Brian: The Novice Barbarian is a humorous text adventure. Brian Woodlouse is a typical fifteen-year-old lad, he has dreams, and he wants more. What makes Brian that bit different is that he longs to follow in his grandfather's footsteps and be a barbarian, his problem is that his mum doesn't approve of anything so dangerous. One day, the headlines in the newspaper gave Brian his big chance. The 'Wand Of Flute' had been stolen from 'The High Mage' and taken to the distant kingdom of Krud. "This", thought Brian, "could be my first quest!" so off he goes.
